cover.title: Cooperative Technology for the innovation
cover.content: We are the TICS cooperative and we want to make technology with a new work model and new social economics and solidarities relationships.

about.title: About FIT
content: We are hard working people and owners of our companies, we want innovation, commintment, quality and a world where the technology is cooperative.
We create technology for an inclusive future.

cooperativeWork.title: Cooperative work
cooperativeWork.content: we generate a space of intercooperative work where we offer to our clients development with possibilities of grow thanks to our colective force of work.
